title: Live in the heart of downtown Denver! 1 bdr 1 bath
posting_body: ['Best Location in Downtown !', 'Live in the heart of downtown Denver!', 'This 1 bed, 1 bath condo has been lovingly cared for and will make you feel right at home!!', 'Situated on the north  side of Brooks Towers means endless natural light and breathtaking city views from the private balcony!', 'Located in the heart of downtown Denver means everything you need is within walking distance -- 1 block from the Denver Center for the Performing Arts, 1 block from 16th Street Mall and the free Mall Ride that will take you down to Union Station/Whole Foods, CU,walking distance to endless restaurants, pubs and entertainment, parks, bike paths and shopping one block away at the 16th Street Mall.', 'Within walking distance of Auraria campus and located in the most exciting part of downtown Denver!', 'Amenities galore including 24 Hour Manager on Duty, Full-Sized, Heated Seasonal Outdoor Pool, Sun Deck, Outdoor Grilling Area, Fitness Center, Resident Club Room with Bar, Catering Kitchen, Conference Room, Billiard and Game Room, Guest/Visitor Parking, 24 Hour Secure Building Access and Video', 'Best location in Denver!', 'Close to 16th Street Mall, Denver Performing Arts Complex, Museums, Culture, Pepsi Center.', 'Walk to see the Rockies or Broncos play or visit downtown and Lodo bars and restaurants.', 'Full amenities building features fitness center, event room, conference room, rooftop pool and even a 7-11 accessible through the lobby!', 'Coors Field, Empower at Mile High Stadium, historic Union Station, Denver Performing Arts Complex, Auraria Campus, and more.', 'Apartment  with private balcony,   outdoor pool, gym, coin operated  laundry.', 'Rent includes : a/c , heat , trash , water,gym,swimming pool.', 'Amazing laundry facility in building.', 'Parking in heated garage is available for additional $250 a month', 'Available after July 30 th , 30 +day minimum rental - Brooks tower', 'Applicants must be able to start a lease within 2-4 weeks  of the property’s listed availability date.', 'Security deposit is equal to one month’s rent.', 'This condo is fully furnished including everything in the kitchen to make it livable .', 'You can certainly add your own furniture.', 'Sorry,smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed,background check required.', 'Parking is optional for additional $260 a month inside of the building garage .', 'Please Email about yourself and your contact phone number.']
